Attacks.Name: Petal Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, all enemy characters within range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack requires one turn to charge before it can be used. After charging, on the next activation of this character, use this attack without paying its power cost. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Staggered.

Attacks.Name: Sludge Bomb
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, up to two target characters are given the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Thick Skin
Superpowers.Effect: Reduce the damage from all attacks against this character by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Superpowers.Name: Overgrow
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of the game, increase the strength of all 'Petal Blizzard' attacks by 2. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters within range 2 of this character.

Superpowers.Name: Chlorophyll Surge
Superpowers.Effect: This character immediately gains 2 power and may make an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
